snippet: Jimmy Butler scored 19 points, Rajon Rondo had 10 points, 14 assists and eight rebounds, and the Chicago Bulls beat the Detroit Pistons 113-82 on Monday night to snap a three-game losing streak....
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Butler scored 19 points, Rajon Rondo had 10 points, 14 assists and eight rebounds, and the Chicago Bulls beat the Detroit Pistons 113-82 on Monday night to snap a three-game losing streak.

headline.main: Bulls Break Out of Slump for 113-82 Rout of Pistons
headline.print_headline: Bulls Break Out of Slump for 113-82 Rout of Pistons
